cookie_advice: We use cookies to ensure that we give you a good experience on our site and to be able to analyze how you use it. If you continue here, we assume that you accept its use. Otherwise go out, run far away and watch if a pigeon is following you.

hero.hero_paragraph_1: We are a developer firm that connects your company with the best talent so that you can carry out those projects that will help you fly very high.
hero.hero_paragraph_2: We know perfectly the challenges of the corporate day-to-day and we understand the needs of your business. That is why we are your best allies in the search for your star hire.

benefits.benefits_paragraph: Our team is made up of people who love what they do and know no limits. We evaluate your product needs to provide you with agile solutions.

with specific work routes to meet all your needs and generate growth and continuity for businesses.

members.members_paragraph: Our co-founders have 15 years of combined experience in the big-data and development industry. We connect the best developers with the best companies through a precise selection process.

members_cards.member_card_description_1: I am a woman with a passion for learning. I learn so that I can teach and motivate others. Having been a teacher, this comes naturally to me.  I came to Pidgin looking to spread that passion to others.
members_cards.member_card_description_2: I believe that relationships in a company should always be reciprocal. When you work hard for your team, wonderful things are achieved.

members_cards.member_card_description_1: I consider myself a leader who works hand in hand with the goals and ideals of Pidgin. My areas of expertise are personnel management and the development of processes for the improvement of activities in other areas.
members_cards.member_card_description_2: I advocate for working like a clockwork to provide our Pigeons with the services they require.

about.about_hero_text_1_3: , a developers on-demand firm that seeks to provide custom-made solutions tailored to every business’ need. We provide services that range from consultancy and analytics to software development.
about.about_hero_text_2: Our main goal is to help our customers’ businesses grow by understanding their challenges as if they were our own.

about_values_cards.title: Mission
about_values_cards.text: To provide customized solutions to Colombian companies that seek digital transformation by means of a dynamic framework that allows us to face the challenges of the current market.

about_values_cards.title: Vision
about_values_cards.text: By 2026, we will be a leading provider of digital solutions in Latin America. We will broaden our services to contribute to and promote an open and collaborative development in the tech community.

about_values_cards.title: Philosophy
about_values_cards.text: Not only do we create added value for the end-user, our clients, and our associates, but also for society in general. We are committed to offering products that exceed expectations.

about_values_elements.title: Ingenuity
about_values_elements.text: We are constantly innovating with candidness and creativity, always finding the most efficient solution.

about_values_elements.title: Trust
about_values_elements.text: We strongly believe in our abilities, and we work autonomously and efficiently.

about_values_elements.title: Transparency
about_values_elements.text: We communicate assertively and always support our ideas on fair and accurate assessments.

about_values_elements.title: Teamwork
about_values_elements.text: We always work with the common good in mind because we believe that together we can achieve more.

about_history.title: Chronicle of a foreseen takeoff
about_history.subtitle: Overflying our history

beginning_history.title: The beginning of everything
beginning_history.paragraph_1: In a discussion regarding the BPO business in 2019, our founders came to an important conclusion: in Colombia, the growing market of BPOs was not only bringing more jobs into the country but also opening up great opportunities for other industries.
beginning_history.paragraph_2: That was the moment Pidgin was born. We were a company that focused on covering specific BPO needs through the provision of developers, with services that ranged from analytics and reporting to databases and many more.
beginning_history.paragraph_3: In 2020, the COVID19 pandemic forced us to close our doors before we could begin operations with our largest clients. Nonetheless, we didn't give up and continued fighting for this dream.
beginning_history.paragraph_4: During that same year, we learned that more and more sectors were in dire need of developers because of the emerging job modalities. The market needed extraordinary developers who were willing to break the mold and divert from what was standard. Companies needed the best developers the market could offer. During these difficult times, we saw many businesses transform; we saw many of them grow,
beginning_history.paragraph_4_highlighted: which ignited within us a burning desire to grow along with them.

incubation_history.title: Incubation
incubation_history.paragraph_1: In 2021 we renewed our brand and our services. Our mission then became to connect the best developers with the best companies.
incubation_history.paragraph_2: We transformed our approach to show businesses that have not yet dared to venture into the digital transformation that evolving with the best technology is possible.
incubation_history.paragraph_3: So, with a new roadmap planned out,
incubation_history.paragraph_3_highlighted: all that was left was to put together a team of people who shared our values and wanted to fly high with us.

pidgin_history.title: From Pigeon to Phoenix
pidgin_history.paragraph_1: We came back in 2022 and initiated operations with one of our largest clients. New Pigeons also joined our flock to help build and expand the company in three main areas: Administration, Sales and Marketing, and Operations.
pidgin_history.paragraph_2: We went from being two dreamers talking about the great opportunities that the BPO market offered to being an active firm that provides development services. Our services are not only directed at those large companies that have brought progress but also at startups, companies who, like us, dream of becoming giants in their own industries.

about_history.text: We are currently active on social media, and we are beginning to make our way into the world of development and startups.
about_history.text_highlighted: We continue moving forward, working as a team to keep on transforming people's lives via the wonderful ideas that our developers can bring about and make possible.

about_members.title: The faces of the
about_members.text: Our co-founders have 15 years of combined experience in the development and big-data sector. They have carefully selected the talents that make up the team through an agile and rigorous process.

members.name: Nicole Mora
members.paragraph_1: I am a woman with a passion for learning. I learn so that I can teach and motivate people, and I came to Pidgin looking to spread that passion to others, a desire which has grown within me since I became a teacher as well. At Pidgin, we aim to become one of the leading firms in the field of technology to offer solutions to our clients that allow them to grow and, at the same time, have the best customer service experience possible.
members.paragraph_2: Knowing that we have an exceptional team to make this dream a reality is very fulfilling. I believe that relationships in a company should always be reciprocal because when you work hard for your team, wonderful things can be achieved. Thus, the greatest challenge for me in this company is to honor and meet all my Pigeons' expectations and needs so that, as a team, we can help make all of our customers’ dreams a reality.

members.name: Camilo Ospina
members.paragraph_1: I am a business development manager from the Gran Colombiano Polytechnic University and have five years of experience in the public and private sectors, developing administrative issues for different companies. I have experience in personnel management and the improvement of activities in several areas through the development of corporative processes.
members.paragraph_2: I have led several customer services’ teams, and teamwork is one of the things I enjoy the most, which is why I consider myself a leader who goes hand in hand with the objectives and ideals of the company. I work with the administrative team, which is essential to keep the administrative and HR processes in order. At Pidgin, we work tirelessly to provide outstanding services to our Pigeons.

members.name: Natalia Morales
members.paragraph_1: In 2017, I graduated from the National University of Colombia with a degree in English Philology and Languages. Studying this degree qualified me to run workshops and language courses and allowed me to improve my communication skills, which were essential for my professional development in later years. I currently specialize in developing projects and creating lasting alliances between companies and institutions at the national and international levels. I have experience in Higher Education Internationalization, Translation and Interpretation, and Business Product Outsourcing (BPO).
members.paragraph_2: I joined Pidgin with the dream of being able to use my skills and knowledge to continue forging alliances between people and companies pursuing complementary goals in a different area of the market: software development. My experience working as a strategic relations consultant at the National University of Colombia was an essential step in my professional development to get to where I am today, helping to build the dreams of our developers and clients one day at a time.

members.name: Ana Gabriela Pérez
members.paragraph_1: I am a firm believer in the constructive power of words. That is the main reason that drove me to study English Philology and Languages at the National University of Colombia and later led me to broaden my knowledge of other languages, specifically German, French, and Spanish, my mother tongue. The skills I developed during my studies at the university have allowed me to work in different areas, specifically in translation, editing and proofreading.
members.paragraph_2: I am currently working at Pidgin as a copywriter and proofreader of both English and Spanish. When I first joined this company, it was a dream of mine to help them grow and change the lives of hundreds of people in the B2B and software development field. In the time I've been part of this family, I've been able to fulfill this dream. Working with a team dedicated to offering quality services to other companies and growth opportunities to creative and brilliant emerging developers has been an invaluable and enriching experience.

about_contact.title: Live the experience from your nest
about_contact.text_1: Join the flock! We always have room for more pigeons.

contact_page.hero_text_1: Get in touch with the right
contact_page.hero_text_3: Send an email according to your needs to the emails that we leave you ahead or enter the data in our form.
contact_page.info_text_3: will always be there for you when you need them. Contact us through our channels:
contact_page.info_text_4: If you are our client already and you need support with any of the services we provide for you, contact us at

services_page.hero_text: Our team of expert developers will assess all your product needs to offer you customized solutions.
services_page.intro_text_3: , our priority is to help companies cover their staffing gaps with flexible and reliable developer hiring models, and to provide fast, high- quality development solutions for ongoing projects that require timely intervention.
services_page.pidgin_style_text_1: We propose solutions and launch projects based on agile and focused processes.
services_page.modalities_intro_text_1: Each and every one of our clients has very different needs.
services_page.modalities_intro_text_4: , we approach them from these three modalities:
services_page.projects_text_1: For clients who are not looking for personnel to fill technology roles but instead seek to obtain a specific development product, we offer the project work service.
services_page.projects_text_2: In this modality, the client tells us what their product needs are, and our team of experts estimates the necessary tools and resources, the delivery time, and the estimated price for the execution of the project as a whole.
services_page.headhunting_text_1: At Pidgin, we are committed to dynamism and teamwork, which is why we like to have diverse teams that are able to share knowledge and collaborate in the development of new ideas.
services_page.headhunting_text_2: Therefore, our headhunting process is strictly governed by these principles, guaranteeing efficiency and high quality.
services_page.staffing_text_1: Pidgin's staffing service is the process by which our developers are selected to be part of a specific work team, in charge of developing a concrete project.
services_page.staffing_text_2: The profiles below are just a few of the many we have.
services_page.staffing_text_3: If the profile you are looking for is not on the list,

profiles.title: Full-Stack Developer
profiles.description: They have the skills to create a fully functioning website. They can set up Linux servers, writing server-side APIs, and much more.

profiles.title: Back-End Developer
profiles.description: The back end of a website consists of a server, an application, and a database. Our Back-End Developers build and maintain these components. Their development skills are Java, C++, Ruby, Python, Scala, and Go.

profiles.title: Front-End Developer
profiles.description: They are our experts in visual, aesthetic, and design user interfaces, and their skills consist of User Interface (UI) Design, User Experience (UX) Design, CSS, JavaScript, HTML, and UI Frameworks.

profiles.title: Software Developer
profiles.description: They work on identifying, designing, installing, and testing software systems that have been built for clients from scratch.

profiles.title: DevOps Developer
profiles.description: They can create applications, deploy them, and monitor them. Their skills are Kubernetes, Docker, Apache Mesos, Jenkins, etc., and HashiCorp stack.

profiles.title: Data Scientist
profiles.description: They are in charge of statistical analysis, machine learning, and predictive modeling. Data Scientists’ skills are Python, R, and SQL, among others.

profiles.img_alt: Woman in black shirt using laptop computer
profiles.title: Security Engineer
profiles.description: They specialize in creating systems, methods, and procedures for testing the security of software systems and correcting their flaws.

profiles.title: Test Engineer
profiles.description: They are responsible for designing and implementing the tests that ensure the quality and functionality of a product.

profiles.img_alt: Man holding smartphone with flat screen monitor
profiles.title: Machine Learning Engineer
profiles.description: They are the ones that focus on researching, building, and designing self-executing artificial intelligence (AI) systems to automate predictive models. Their development skills are Python, Java, C++, C, R, and JavaScript.

services_page.stack_text_1: Our team masters the following computer languages to tackle all your projects!
services_page.stack_text_2: If you have another one in mind, feel free to contact us directly to assess the options!
services_page.bottom_cta_text_1: You dreamed it, and now we are giving you your wings. Let's spread them and help your business fly!
services_page.bottom_cta_text_2: Don’t be afraid to contact us, we won't bite.

pidgin_style_steps.step_title: Tell our messenger pigeons what you need, and they will forward them to the expert Pigeons.
pidgin_style_steps.step_paragraph_1: Do you need IT roles? If so, which ones and how many? Tell us, and we will get them for you in a flick of our wings! (Or as fast as possible).
pidgin_style_steps.step_paragraph_2: Do you have an urgent need that you can only cover with a developer? No matter the requirement, our developers can code all your dreams!

pidgin_style_steps.step_title: Book a consultation with our experts to learn about the different ways in which we can help you. Let’s start building dreams together!
pidgin_style_steps.step_paragraph_1: Are you afraid your project might be too hard to get done? Don’t worry. In Pidgin, we can help you bring your dreams to life.
pidgin_style_steps.step_paragraph_2: Our Pigeons understand how costs can vary depending on the size and complexity of your needs.

pidgin_style_steps.step_paragraph_1: If our solutions are ideal, our representatives will give you the instructions to lay the groundwork for the beginning of a long-lasting and fruitful relationship.
